channel.title: I cant study, so im going to fail,so imma get grounded...read on
channel.description: well i feel pretty scared bout next year cause like i havent studyed [b]EVER!!!!!!!!![/b] so i need some tips. and like is litercy test hard

item.title: I cant study, so im going to fail,so imma get grounded...read on
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“Mattymat1313, post:9, topic:128032”]i passed grade 8th by doing the following(and this isnt a lie this is the truth):

  1. passing all grades with d’s and F’s
  2. missing summer school on purpose.
  3. Never studied.
  4. And passed the SAT with 85% in math, and 26% in reading, reading was sooo boring, i can read great but cant summarize it cause its tooo boring =D.
    and after doing all this i get accepted into a average high school. lol, but this time ima try and at least meet some c’s without totally boring myself to death.

studyisland is ur friend. googal it.

EDIT: true story, but got introuble for the grades, but i am doing better now.[/quote]

Googal it? anyways,

it’s not cool to pass grades with D’s and F’s

GJ your doing better now though…

Read full topic

item.title: I cant study, so im going to fail,so imma get grounded...read on
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

All I do is memorize everything (takes me about an hour) and I get 90-100% on each test. Works especially well for AP class tests. Also let me say, reading does help. If you are required to read something, then spend time reading through it.

item.source: I cant study, so im going to fail,so imma get grounded...read on

item.title: I cant study, so im going to fail,so imma get grounded...read on
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

Ask your teacher to give you their term planner, and read the material before you learn it in class. When you learn it in class, you won’t get lost, and you can pay attention to any extra details the teacher gives, which aren’t written in your textbook. When you get home after the lesson, google the subject a bit more, and try to find something about it that interests you. Make sure the basics of what you have learned are completely stuck in your head before moving on. If you revise throughout the term, you won’t be stressed when it comes time for exams.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Samzter:

well i feel pretty scared bout next year cause like i havent studyed EVER!!! so i need some tips. and like is litercy test hard

Uh, you’re an idiot.

To study, revise what you have written down or read and remember information on the subject.
Then practice something related to it over and over again or something.

It’s not that hard.
Just time consuming.
